title: Rita Dominic becomes Zaron Cosmetic Ambassador
content:
The Meeting star actress, Rita Dominic has added another feather to her cap as she recently clinched ambassadorial deal with foremost beauty line, Zaron Cosmetic. Speaking on the new deal, Rita disclosed that it’s another phace in her career as a celebrity and as such, she will represent the beauty line so well. Few days […] 
 
The post appeared first on Daily Times Nigeria Newspaper . 
 
Source: Daily Times Entertainment
